item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m an old school Software Developer, CTO by trade, who gave up the rat race to build software startups. Have a passion for enterprise software, B2B, self-service bottom-up go-to-market models. Founder & CEO @ Documize Founded Countersoft My pet theory at the moment is that a combination of open source core mixed with the Flyweel Model. can yield special results. Let’s see. Thoughts herein represent my own personal views/opinions/ideas.
